Pizza Hut in China is fine for a Western food fix. This restaurant offered decent food at fair prices. The atmosphere was really nice, though. This Pizza Hut offers a nice light breakfast to give you some energy before venturing out, and also offers a full menu. The staff here do not communicate very well in English. Be sure to...

В 10 минутах ходьбы от гостиницы Новотель Синьцяо Чунвэньмэнь расположено это кафе. Хорошо туда сходить, особенно если вы устали от китайской кухни. Паста неплохая, но надо помнить, что есть острая и не острая (стоит уточнять). пицца на любителя. Тесто у пиццы довольно толстое. Есть небольшой выбор европейских вин, вполне достойных по качеству.
Typical chinese Pizza Hut <f0><U+009F><U+0091><U+0092>. Pizza is good also the Drinks. The Personal does Not Speak a good english.

We had the two Western style of breakfast. Omelet and Ham N Eggs. Both were good. The coffee were delicious as well. I would never imaging eating these at America or Europe

Very different then the Pizza Hut in the United States. Actually quite nice and the food was both good and hot. Also many more options then I am use to. We used the picture menu but the items ordered we different then items received. Worth a stop if you need a break from traditional food

We ate here a few times during our stay in Beijing as we found the food really good and prices were ok. Pizzas are delicious and we tried a few pasta dishes which were nice. Had soup one day but it didn't arrive until after my partner finished his starter and after we both ate our pizza main course which...
